text: Have a chronic  disabling illness which keeps getting worseI have schizophrenia  and because of this illness  I ended up being completely disabled  Even though I take treatment which works as intended  the treatment for schizophrenia is only made to target a small part of the symptoms of this disabling condition  without addressing most symptoms I ve experienced a severe cognitive decline  lost my social ability  and my ability to function  I also can t experience any pleasure anymore   life seems dull and monotone  and it has lost all of its color  My emotions are gone  And to make things worse  I have a hard time speaking and making sentences  although it s not as visible when typing There s no treatment for these symptoms   medication only treats symptoms such as delusions and hallucinations  It doesn t treat progressive decline associated with this illness The illness is getting worse and worse  My mental state keeps deteriorating   Also  I recently demanded for my medical records to be handed out to me  I read them  and it said that when I went back to a new school after being hospitalized and treated  the school contacted the hospital saying that the students were  disturbed  when I joined their class  and that some even feared me Are there any alternatives to killing myself  Not only did I lose everything  but chances are  it will only get worse with time I have everything planned out already  and I m not afraid of going through with it anymore  I chose highly fatal methods  because if I will survive  my life will be even worse   I will get hospitalized against my will for indefinite amounts of time
summary: Schizophrenic is a chronic disabling illness which keeps getting worse. There is no treatment for it. The school contacted the hospital when he went back to a new school after being hospitalized and treated, because some students were disturbed when he joined their class.

text: It doesn t matter to me if I live or dieSo  up until I was   I had a pretty good childhood  after that it was difficult  I m not going to get into it bc I feel that there s no point  but I m   now  For the past   years my life has felt on pause  Like nothing of value has happened  I overcame most of the struggles that I went through   but sometimes I feel I was supposed to die around   Since then  especially the past   years my life has felt meaningless  I don t feel like I m meant to be around anymore  and that doesn t really scare me  The thought of death doesn t scare me  to me death is just a refresh button to move onto the next life  Sometimes I feel like I m supposed to be done  There s a part of me that wonders if there s more for me  More to experience  But the future just seems grey and no existent  I was in love  That s the closest thing I ve experienced to what felt truly important in life   I would never commit suicide  but at the same time I feel apathetic towards living or dying  I live alone  I m in college but I don t have a feeling of realness towards my future career  Things just feel eerie lately  Death is not bad or wrong  but at the same time if I were to die of natural causes  which I believe your eternal self decides on  physical form  amp  higher consiousness  I would never want my family to feel it was their fault or suffer immense pain from it  Which of course they would   I just feel like there s no real love in my life anymore  What is there anymore to live for  Is what it feels like
